column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I love Bavette's and they've quickly become one of favorite places.  Everything from the food & drinks
column2: to the service & ambiance; it's just all done so well.  I'm a big fan of Gilt Bar next door (and also enjoy me some Doughnut Vault)
column3: so I had high hopes for this place and I wasn't disappointed one bit.
